definitions.text: improve or perfect by pruning or polishing
bring to a highly developed, finished, or refined state
perfected or made shiny and smooth
examples: in a freshly ironed dress and polished shoes

definitions.text: showing a high degree of refinement and the assurance that comes from wide social experience
examples: maintained an urbane tone in his letters

definitions.text: (of grains especially rice) having the husk or outer layers removed
(of lumber or stone) to trim and smooth
